scripts.build: npm run build:prompts && bun run build:ts && bun run build:rust && bun run build:python
scripts.build:rust: test -d rust && cd rust && cargo build --release || echo 'Rust build skipped - no rust directory'
scripts.build:python: test -d python && cd python && (python3 -m build 2>/dev/null || pyproject-build) || echo 'Python build skipped - no python directory'
scripts.test: bun run test:ts && bun run test:rust && bun run test:python
scripts.test:ts: cd typescript && vitest run || echo 'TypeScript tests skipped - no tests found'
scripts.test:rust: test -d rust && cd rust && cargo test || echo 'Rust tests skipped'
scripts.test:python: test -d python && cd python && pytest -p no:anchorpy --asyncio-mode=auto || echo 'Python tests skipped'
scripts.lint:rust: test -d rust && cd rust && cargo clippy --all-targets --fix --allow-dirty --allow-staged -- -D warnings && cargo fmt || echo 'Rust lint skipped'
scripts.lint:python: test -d python && cd python && ruff check --fix . && ruff format . || echo 'Python lint skipped'
scripts.lint:python:fix: test -d python && cd python && ruff check --fix . && ruff format . || echo 'Python lint fix skipped'

FARCASTER_DRY_RUN.description: Enables or disables dry run mode when interacting with Farcaster; when true, operations are simulated but not executed.

FARCASTER_FID.description: The Farcaster FID (user identifier) used to publish or manage casts for a specific account.

MAX_CAST_LENGTH.description: Maximum number of characters allowed in a Farcaster cast.

FARCASTER_POLL_INTERVAL.description: Polling interval in seconds for Farcaster operations such as fetching new casts.

ENABLE_CAST.description: Enables or disables the ability to post casts to Farcaster.

CAST_INTERVAL_MIN.description: Minimum interval in minutes between automated posts.

CAST_INTERVAL_MAX.description: Maximum interval in minutes between automated posts.

ENABLE_ACTION_PROCESSING.description: Turns on or off automated action processing for Farcaster events.

ACTION_INTERVAL.description: Interval in minutes between action-processing cycles.

CAST_IMMEDIATELY.description: If true, posts are published immediately instead of waiting for a schedule.

MAX_ACTIONS_PROCESSING.description: Maximum number of Farcaster actions to process in a single batch.

FARCASTER_SIGNER_UUID.description: UUID of the Neynar signer associated with the Farcaster account, required to sign casts.

FARCASTER_NEYNAR_API_KEY.description: API key used to authenticate with the Neynar Farcaster API.

FARCASTER_HUB_URL.description: Base URL for the Farcaster hub the client should communicate with.
